refnamediv.refpurpose: writes a DXF (Data Exchange Format) representation of shape into the given output session.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function writes a DXF (Data Exchange Format) representation of shape into the given output session.

refsect2.title: shape
refsect2.para: If shape is null, the function returns without writing anything to the shape.

refsect2.title: attrs
refsect2.para: vector of arbitrary DXF properties in form (tag1, value1, tag2, value2...) where tags are integer codes according to DXF specification; related values are not validated and are printed to the session as-is. Current version does not support ARCSTRINGs, CURVEs, nor CURVEPOLYGONs.

example.title: Simple example
